mapper.insert: INSERT INTO college ( college_cd, college_name, create_at, delete_at ) VALUES ( #{collegeCd}, #{collegeName}, #{createAt}, #{deleteAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT college_cd, college_name, create_at, delete_at FROM college ORDER BY college_cd
mapper.update: UPDATE college SET college_name = #{collegeName}, create_at = #{createAt}, delete_at = #{deleteAt} WHERE college_cd = #{collegeCd}
